title: Incorrect enablement of "Build" action in popup menu
description: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user has selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in Preferences > Workbench. This behavior is incorrect.
OB: The "Build" action in the Java popup menus is always enabled, regardless of the automatic build setting in Preferences.
EB: The "Build" action should be disabled in the Java popup menus when the automatic build setting is enabled in Preferences.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Right-click on a resource in the Java perspective.
5. Observe that the "Build" option is still present and enabled in the popup menu. It should be disabled in this case.
